chapters.title: Chapter 23: The Testing
chapters.info: Brandelwyn (Bran) al'Vere, p. 344 (303)—Innkeeper of the Winespring Inn in Emond's Field, and Egwene's father. He is dead in the world created by the testing ter'angreal that Nynaeve experiences during her test to become one of the Accepted. See also al'Vere, Egwene; al'Vere, Marin.
